text:
Overview
This part will show you exactly how to prepare data and develop MLP, CNN and LSTM
deep learning models for a range of diﬀerent time series forecasting problems. The goal of the
modeling examples in these chapters is to provide templates that you can copy into your project
and start using immediately. As such, you may ﬁnd some of the examples a little repetitive.
After reading the chapters in this part, you will know:
